subject: Horse Racing
Assaults
Preakness Stakes
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Jockey Robby Albarado, who won the 2007 Preakness, was fined $500 for a misdemeanor assault conviction from a scuffle with his former girlfriend in Louisville, Ky., but his legal problems are not over.
snippet: Jockey Robby Albarado, who won the 2007 Preakness, was fined $500 for a misdemeanor assault conviction from a scuffle with his former girlfriend in Louisville, Ky., but his legal problems are not over.
